name: VNDetectedObjectObservation
desc: An observation that provides the position and extent of an image feature that an image analysis request detects.

items.name: init(boundingBox: CGRect)
items.desc: Creates an observation with a bounding box.

items.name: init(requestRevision: Int, boundingBox: CGRect)
items.desc: Creates an observation with a revision number and bounding box.

items.name: var boundingBox: CGRect
items.desc: The bounding box of the object that the request detects.

items.name: var globalSegmentationMask: VNPixelBufferObservation?
items.desc: A resulting pixel buffer from a request to generate a segmentation mask for an image.
